section.name: COM engine
section.chapter_description: Component Object Model (COM) client interface: binary-interface standard for software components on Windows.

keyword.name: COM examples
keyword.description: Some example to show how to use COM interface.

keyword.name: actxGetRunningServer
keyword.description: Handle to running instance of Automation server.

keyword.name: COM_fieldnames
keyword.description: Returns the properties name of an COM object.

keyword.name: COM_get
keyword.description: Get property value from COM interface.

keyword.name: COM_invoke
keyword.description: Invoke method on COM object or interface.

keyword.name: COM_ismethod
keyword.description: Determines if input is an existing COM object method.

keyword.name: COM_isprop
keyword.description: Determines if input is an existing COM object property.

keyword.name: COM_methods
keyword.description: Returns the methods name of an COM object.

keyword.name: COM_set
keyword.description: Set object or interface property to specified value.

keyword.name: COM_used
keyword.description: Returns list of current used COM handle.

keyword.name: COM_xlsfinfo
keyword.description: Determines if file contains Microsoft Excel spreadsheet.

keyword.name: COM_xlsread
keyword.description: Read Microsoft Excel spreadsheet file using COM.

keyword.name: COM_xlswrite
keyword.description: Write Microsoft Excel spreadsheet file using COM.

keyword.name: iscom
keyword.description: Determine whether input is COM or ActiveX object.
